content: Manual 1: Instructions on maintaining optimal spindle speed to reduce vibration and prevent tool wear.
Manual 2: Guidelines for calibrating feed rate and temperature settings to improve surface finish.
Manual 3: Troubleshooting steps for addressing unexpected increases in wear rate and dimensional inaccuracies.
Work Order 1: Adjust spindle speed to 1200 RPM due to observed high vibration levels.
Work Order 2: Replace cutting tool due to excessive wear detected during routine inspection.
Work Order 3: Recalibrate machine settings to address surface finish quality issues.
